name: Almost Fair
description:
This is a game done in few days for the Winter 2019 #UE4jam .

It's a Boss Rush game with 3 Stages made only by me this weekend. It has a coop mode too. And if you want to test each other in an almost fair environment (Player 1 = Keyboard + Mouse and Player 2 = Gamepad), then there's the VS Mode with items (Hearts) being almost fair to the one picking them up (80% of the time it's something good like healing your character, dealing more damage to your opponent ...and other stuff).

I hope you enjoy it.
